org.easybatch.jpa

Class JpaRecordWriter<P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.core.writer.AbstractRecordWriter<P,GenericRecord<P>>
      • org.easybatch.jpa.JpaRecordWriter<P>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - the entity type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordProcessor<GenericRecord<P>,GenericRecord<P>>, RecordWriter<GenericRecord<P>>

    public class JpaRecordWriter<P>
extends AbstractRecordWriter<P,GenericRecord<P>>
    Write entities to a database using JPA.

    This writer does not commit a transaction after writing records. You can use a JpaTransactionListener for this purpose.
